fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each night, you will reflexively attack anybody who visits you.
- If you didn't get visited, you attack whoever you visited instead.
- You can survive any attack as long as you kill whoever attacked you.
- Roleblock, Redirect, Control Immune
- If you survive until Day 3, the existence of your role will be announced, and an additional voting event will be held to hang another player, known as the "Vote Hick".
